p5

Class SimpleDice

  • java.lang.Object
    • p5.SimpleDice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    p5.Dice

    public class SimpleDice
extends java.lang.Object
implements p5.Dice
    SimpleDice creates a dice with a minimum of 1 side, if a lower value is entered by the user this exception will be caught and will retunr a statement saying there can not be a dice with sides less than one.
    Author:
    JakeODonnell

      SimpleDice()
      Only used if the dice has 6 sides.
      SimpleDice(int sides)
      This constructor creates a dice with a random number of sides, however the dice must have atleast 1 side.
